title: Aurelion Sol's theme. Greatest galactic war ever.
body:
It's so commanding.    I feel like I'm ready to prepare for the greatest space ship battle ever where everything is at stake. 

Fear. Loss. Determination.Hope.  Amongst other feels. 

Wonderfully done and kudos/thank you to the composers and sound designers and everyone who made this champ come to life.

replies.body: Thanks everyone! It was an absolute blast designing the sound and VO for Aurelion Sol and happy you all are enjoying him. I agree, his music is definitely one of my favorite champ themes. Kudos to Jason Wiley, the composer for Aurelion's theme!

Here's a piano cover of the Aurelion Sol theme music:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=xWUrW2Xh-wg
Hope you find this interesting :)
Oh my Goooooo-------{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}   Thank you soo muchhhh

Thank YOU so much for listening!
Glad you enjoyed :D

I sounds a lot like Veigar's theme with the pacing, and I love it so much for it.

Specifically, it's pretty normal (pretty gorgeus and breathtaking alright) but then it becomes so _sad_, and afterwards it gains a magnificent power.

Also the mesh of different sounds is a delight for the ear. I've waited for it to come out since the teaser video for Sol and I am not disapointed.
Yeah! The binural sound effect is so pleasant! All the low rumbles and swirling sounds- Awesome!
